signify.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to represent, mean, or be a sign of something
signify.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Some tribes use special facial markings to signify status.
The image of the lion signified power and strength.
The symbol used signifies that the frequency is measured in kHz.
signify.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you signify a feeling, opinion etc, you do something that acts as a sign so that other people know your feeling or opinion
signify.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Hamilton waved his hand to signify that he didn’t mind what they decided.
He turned away from her slightly to signify his indifference.
signify.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to be important enough to have an effect on something
signify.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: These figures don’t really signify in the overall results.
